QuestData.Title: Kaja'mite? Kaja'must!
QuestData.Description:
I been waitin' to talk to the King for a while now, but he not be seein' me! And this pompous lackey not be listenin' either.
We got a problem brewin' in the Village of the Vines, just outside de city. With all the Horde landin' in the Harbor, some goblins got wind of our old kaja'mite quarry. They split outta here like the teeth of Deathwing himself behind 'em.
But that quarry be dangerous. Wicked dangerous. Think you can go to de village an' talk some sense into them goblins?
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Village in the Vines.
